translation.en: [Afro's father] Wait here, son.
[Afro's father] It'll soon be over.
[Justice] Remember me, No.1?
I've been waiting a very long time for this.
[Afro's father] I know.
"No.1" But, it all ends here.
[Justice] Come on, man.
Gimme whatcha got.
Finally…
I've got the title of No.1 in my hand.
Do… not… avenge… me.
[Justice] With this band across my forehead…
I will rule this world as God himself.
[Justice] It's unfortunate that you had to see this, boy.
This moment will always haunt you.
translation.ko: 이 순간은 널 평생 따라다닐 거다

translation.en: You will be consumed by hatred for me.
Challenge me when you're ready to duel a god.
translation.ko: 신에게 맞설 준비가 되면 날 찾아와라

translation.en: [ronin] This is the end of the road…
Afro Samurai!
We got 20 guys here all armed to the teeth,
we got you surrounded.
We never said we were gonna play fair.
I got no idea why,
but some pretty rich folks wanna pay top dollar for that cloth.
translation.ko: 그 천 조각에 거액을 지불하겠다는 녀석이 있어서 말이야

translation.en: Why don't you… give it up, kid.
Everybody's a tough guy… Okay, have it your way.
translation.ko: 쉽게 가는 놈이 없군 그래, 좋을 대로 해

translation.en: Gear-up boys!
Look at this boys!
Tough guy here's gonna take us out with only one hand on his sword.
translation.ko: 달랑 검 한 자루 들고 우릴 상대하시겠다?

translation.en: Cut him up!
[assassin 1] What the fu… That's impossible!
[assassin 2] You son of a…
[assassin 3] Fucking fucker! I cut you! I cut you!
translation.ko: 이 새끼, 내가 가만 안 둬!

translation.en: [ronin] I took this job because…
I thought you were just a legend.
translation.ko: 네가 전설에 불과한 줄 알았기 때문이야

translation.en: Just a story… a story to scare little kids.
But you're the real deal the Demon who dares to challenge God.
So what the hell do you want?
Don't seem to me
like you out to make this stinkin' world a better place.
translation.ko: 네가 이 썩어 빠진 세계를 구원할 것처럼 보이진 않는데

translation.en: Why you gotta kill all my men?
Why you gotta kill me?
[Afro] Nothing personal, it's just revenge.
translation.ko: 사적인 감정은 없어 그저 복수 때문이지

translation.en: [Ninja-Ninja] Yo yo yo yo yo, Afro!
[Ninja-Ninja] That was off the chain!
Cold blooded! Damn, motherfucker!
Excuse me for probing, but what you just did back there,
was it absolutely necessary?
I'm beginning to wonder
if you got any feeling for human life left in you at all.
translation.ko: 사람 목숨 같은 건 쥐똥으로 아는 것 같단 말이지

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey. If you don't stop diss'in me,
I'm gonna stop followin' your brutal ass around.
Then whose gonna watch your back?
translation.ko: 그럼 네 뒤는 누가 봐 주냐?

translation.en: Anyway, I did check some monk-looking bald motherfucker in a tree
translation.ko: 그건 그렇고 아까 나무 위에서 수도승처럼 생긴 대머리 새끼가

translation.en: chattin' on a celly while watchin' your killin' spree.
Don't that bother you? Sure as hell bother me.
translation.ko: 신경 쓰이지 않아? 난 완전 쓰이는데

translation.en: Yo! Yo!
Hold up! Hold up!
Afro!
[punk] Yo! Yo! Yo!
Breaking news just in!
Huh? What the…
[Kuro] Jeez…
[Okiku] Easy kid.
What's the problem?
It's HIM! He's here! He's here!
[Juzo] What the hell are you talking about, punk?
[punk] Ain't no doubt about it, man.
He…
Here. Drink up.
He had this Afro-hairdo… you know what I'm sayin'?
translation.ko: 아프로 머리를 한 녀석이라고 느낌 오지?

translation.en: With kind of a greenish tint to it if you looked real close.
And he was wearing this freakin' headband,
with the No.2 stamped high across his freakin' forehead…
[Kihachi] Did you say Afro-hairdo? Greenish tint?
[Kurou] The headband… With No.2 written across it?
[Juzo] Make no mistake…
That's him, that's the No.2.
The AFRO SAMURAI.
The Afro Samurai?
The one who cut down the assassins of the western guild?
translation.ko: 서부에서 온 암살자들을 다 죽여 버렸다던?

translation.en: Th… The No.2 swordsman of the world?
translation.ko: 전 세계에서 두 번째로 검을 잘 다룬다던데?

translation.en: He's cold blooded!
He killed the brothers of Asura in only five moves.
translation.ko: 다섯 수 만에 아수라 형제를 죽였대

translation.en: So don't think twice about crossing swords with that guy…
[Kihachi] What a bunch of sissies. Screw that, cowards!
translation.ko: 겁쟁이들만 모였군 그럴 거면 그만둬, 겁보들아!

translation.en: You guys just watch while take that No.2 headband.
translation.ko: 내가 2번 머리띠를 손에 넣는 거나 보셔!

translation.en: That's all bullshit! You assholes just watch!
translation.ko: 웃기고 있네 너희는 앉아서 구경이나 해

translation.en: I'm gonna take him out!
[patron 1] It's gonna be me!
[patron 2] Let me take him baby! He's all mine.
[patron 3] Naa, I'm gonna be the No.2!
All y'all just shut up!
Cause while you talk and talk and talk,
my spear will be splitting his head in half!
translation.ko: 난 이 창으로 놈의 머리를 쪼개 버릴 테니까

translation.en: Just like this.
[patron] Wow! Hey, man!
Get that rusty piece of junk outta my face, man…
[Soshun] Ma'am…
Yeah?
[Soshun] Why is everyone after this Afro Samurai?
translation.ko: 왜 다들 아프로 사무라이라는 자를 노리는 거지?

translation.en: You don't know? You really must be from out-of-town.
translation.ko: 정말 몰라? 어디 촌구석에서 왔나 보네

translation.en: We got ourselves a legend around here.
[Soshun] A legend?
[Okiku] Look. Two ancient headbands.
translation.ko: 일설에 따르면 두 개의 고대 머리띠가 있대

translation.en: No.1 and No.2.
If you have the No.1, you're like a god.
NOBODY can touch you…
Except he who wears… No.2.
translation.ko: 유일한 예외가 있다면 2번 머리띠를 가진 자라는 거?

translation.en: The trouble with THAT is―
The trouble with THAT is,
that anyone in the world can challenge you.
translation.ko: 2번 머리띠는 누구나 노릴 수 있다는 거군

translation.en: Ha ha ha ha!
Clever boy. You're interested?
The life of No.2: constant combat.
But ultimately, the path a warrior should take
translation.ko: 사실 그게 우리 무사들의 삶이기도 하지

translation.en: and the reward is to become a god.
translation.ko: 그에 대한 보상은 신이 되는 거고

translation.en: Yep. They say the No.1 waits at the top of Mt. Shumi.
translation.ko: 맞아, 들리는 말로는 넘버 1이 슈미산에서 기다린대

translation.en: You can't miss it. It's got like 2 huge hand like things…
translation.ko: 당신도 보면 알 거야 거대한 손 두 개가 뻗은 것처럼...

translation.en: [giant] Get outta my way!
[Kihachi] Take it easy, Mac!
You ain't the only one here who thinks he can take him.
translation.ko: 놈을 없앨 수 있다고 생각하는 게 너 혼자는 아니야

translation.en: You caved my eyes in!
[Juzo] Fucking son of a bitch!
You warmed up yet?
Hey hey, you wanna fight? Take it outside!
[Afro] Lemonade… ice cold.
[Okiku] Coming right up. 250 please.
Lemonade… Heh, heh, heh…
[Juzo] Hey man, shut the hell up!
[giant] Now look who we got ourselves here.
[Okiku] Here you are… lemonade.
Drink that, boy. He he he…
Uh, another one?
…on his tab?
[punk] Holy…
[Okiku] Here you are… lemonade.
That's gonna cost you more than 250.
And I think that guy's tab has run out.
translation.ko: 게다가 저 친구 이름으로는 힘들 것 같아

translation.en: That's very cool.
[Afro] Oi-shi… Refreshing…
Good, you'll need it.
You've still got a long way to go, No.2.
translation.ko: 아직 갈 길이 멀잖아, 넘버 투

translation.en: Cross the mountains by way of the "Low Down East" path.
Beware of the cliffs, and know that their waiting for you.
translation.ko: 절벽 조심해 놈들이 당신을 기다릴 거야

translation.en: [Afro] Thanks.
[Ninja-Ninja] Hey Afro! Yo, Fro-boy.
Your sure this is the right way to go?
These cliffs don't look so safe man.
And one other thing.
Uh… Don't look now but I think you got a stalker.
translation.ko: 티는 내지 말고 들어 뒤에 웬 놈이 따라붙은 것 같아

translation.en: A crazy fan boy from the tea house
and he don't want your autograph, more like your epitaph.
translation.ko: 사인이 아니라 네 묘비병을 원하는 눈치야

translation.en: Now, I suggest you keep stepin' cause this one…
translation.ko: 그러니까 지금처럼 계속 갈 길이나 가자고

translation.en: …is a stone killer, for real.
Yo, didn't you hear me? Get going!
translation.ko: 뭐야, 내 말 못 들었어? 계속 가라니까

translation.en: I'm trying to pull your coat.
All you gonna do is ignore me?
Alright, alright, you wanna blow it for me and you, huh?
translation.ko: 그래, 알았어 황천길 동무나 돼 달라는 거지?

translation.en: [Afro] Shut up…
Well fine, go on, get your lanky ass killed then.
translation.ko: 아주 혼자 잘났지 그럼 죽는 것도 혼자 죽든가

translation.en: But don't say I didn't warn ya!
Later!
[Shosun] I am called Shosun.
I come from the land of the great weapon masters of the west.
translation.ko: 무기의 대가들이 사는 서쪽 땅에서 왔다

translation.en: I see you wear one of the head bands of legend
that leads to godhood.
So, shall we?
Afro, don't fight this fucker.
He got arrows and grenades and shit.
translation.ko: 저 자식은 활에 수류탄으로 완전 중무장했어

translation.en: You ain't got no chance dude!
Oh, lord, no no no!
Agh! Is you dead?
Don't tell me you dead!
Is you dead? I asked you a question!
Your jumping has only put you
directly in the line of my fire, samurai fool!
Where will you go now, great No.2 warrior?
My aim is only to move forward.
[Ninja-Ninja] Whoa! Brother you did your thang!
I thought you was dead for sure!
Yo, my man, I… I gots to tell ya,
I don't know if it's your natural pheromones or you need a shower,
translation.ko: 네 페로몬인지 뭔진 몰라도 가서 좀 씻든가 해

translation.en: but assassins are com'in to us like flies on hot shit.
I gots to say, there's something strange still out there.
translation.ko: 이게 다가 아닐 거란 느낌이 든단 말이지

translation.en: [Brother 1] Hm… Yes…
[Brother 2] It's me! Brother 2.
[Brother 1] Yes… uh-huh, I see… Carry on then.
And remember you are among the righteous few
translation.ko: 넌 의로운 소수라는 걸 잊지 마

translation.en: and we have placed great faith in your ability to track him.
translation.ko: 녀석을 잘 추적할 거라 믿어 의심치 않는다

translation.en: Because the No.2 warrior has now begun to move in earnest,
it seems our cherished brother's work is now truly beginning.
translation.ko: 우리의 소중한 형제도 드디어 임무에 착수했어

translation.en: The No.2 walks the path Low Down East…
[Brother 1] In the great ancestral direction…
Our No.2 warrior's journey will no doubt end
translation.ko: 넘버 2의 여정이 끝날 날도 얼마 남지 않았다

translation.en: at the great valley before the high slopes of Mt. Shumi.
translation.ko: 슈미산 비탈에 오르기도 전에 놈은 위대한 계곡에서 끝나겠지

translation.en: We're getting almost all the data we need.
The mandate of heaven has spoken and agreed with us,
translation.ko: 천명은 우리의 것 하늘이 우리와 함께한다

translation.en: the righteous, the EMPTY SEVEN!
Wash over us, the supreme power!
Let us pay homage to the Holy Way.
[Brother 1] Let us close our eyes and feel the power.
Let the Divine roll within you.
Let the Holy Way call you.
As the Divine Will has ordained, we have risen from the ashes.
translation.ko: 천명이 우리를 이끌어 재에서 소생케 했으니

translation.en: …from this condition of oppression,
we have borne the cross, but we will seize the crown…
translation.ko: 십자가를 짊어질 자는 우리이나 왕관 또한 거머쥘 터

translation.en: and the prophecy shall be fulfilled eye for an eye
No.2 shall know no mercy at the hands of the EMPTY SEVEN!
translation.ko: 무무방주가 나선 이상 넘버 2에게 자비는 없다

translation.en: Prepare for the final struggle.
Freedom is in our reach.
The supreme power of God shall be ours!
Amen!
Have you heard, my brothers?
[Brothers] Yes!
[Brother 1] Do you hear the word?
[Brothers] right!
[Ninja-Ninja] Man, all these kill'ins are really starting to depress me.
translation.ko: 죽는 걸 하도 봤더니 나까지 우울해지네

translation.en: You know what I mean Afro?
Oh, mo' cold shoulder, uh?
[Ninja-Ninja] Yo, Holmes, you're walk'in a little funny.
translation.ko: 어이, 왜 안 어울리게 비틀거리고 그래?

translation.en: What's up? Whoa, wassup?
translation.ko: 어이, 왜 안 어울리게 비틀거리고 그래? 뭐야, 진짜 무슨 일 났어?

translation.en: Was it something in the lemonade?
Oh, snap, you fucked up Holmes!
Oh look, oh shit, it was those damn arrows!
translation.ko: 상처를 보니까 아까 화살에 당한 것 같아

translation.en: Come on, Afro, snap out of it man!
Snap out of it!
[Brother 6] He's injured, I can take him.
[Brother 2] What?
Hey, hey! Wait! Wait! It's too early!
translation.ko: 아니, 잠깐 기다려 그러기엔 너무 이르다고!

translation.en: Hey, hey, hey, can't you give a brother a break, yo?
translation.ko: 이봐, 사람이 가끔은 좀 쉬기도 해야지

translation.en: Can't you see the man is down?
translation.ko: 이 녀석 쓰러진 거 안 보여?

translation.en: What about honor and fairness and shit?
Hey, that a motherfuckin' RPG?
You got a motherfuckin' RPG?
A RPG in a motherfuckin' backpack?
Wait, wait wait, can we talk about this?
You ain't got a monologue, you're not gonna give a bad guy speech?
translation.ko: 나쁜 놈들 보면 이럴 때 꼭 한마디씩 하잖아

translation.en: Oh my god. Oh my god, oh my god…
[Brother 2] That fool!
He may have destroyed the sacred No.2 headband as well!
